entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
